transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ya Nishant bhai baat kar rahe Nishant power coating se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir main na India Mart se baat kar raha hun kal wo mere representative ki baat hui thi na aap se service ko leke to wo aapne feedback non satisfied kar diya tha sir aapne.
To main usi ke liye call kiya tha ki sir kya issue aa raha hai sir aapko India Mart se.
Customer: Order to nahi wo order aana chahiye na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Order aana chahiye na.
Executive: Order tab aayega sir aap service ko use kijiye sir aap bilkul bhi service ko use nahi kar rahe hain aap sir. Aur sir by lead jo aa rahi hai na sari local byer aapke paas mostly bhi aa rahi hai aur all over India se bhi lead aapke paas aa rahi hai.
Aur sir last time jab mera aapse conversation hua tha jo apna bathroom wall shelf hai aur maine aapko bataya tha ki sir 90% supplier Rajkot ka juda hua India Mart pe. Aur wo acha khasa business kar rahe India Mart se sir.
Lekin aap keh rahe hain.
Sir wo to sir bina service ko use kare kaise business milega aapko. Jab tak aap do char logo se byer consume karke baat chit nahi karoge usko quotation nahi doge follow up nahi karoge kaise business milega sir aap hi to batao.
To aapko samajhna padega na ki sir ye India Mart ka platform hai aapne paisa kharch kiya hai aapne paisa kharch kiya hai naye byer ke liye sir to hum aapko naye byer ki information de rahe hain lekin sir connect to aap hi karo na uske sath sir.
Aur jo aapki industry ke log Rajkot mein jude hain na wo bhi same kaam kar rahe hain sir wo bhi sir client ki byer ko consume kar rahe hain quotation de rahe hain follow up kar rahe hain aur business kar rahe hain unke sath.
Aur sir aapka material to wo hai ki har ghar mein requirement hai har ghar mein requirement hai sir.
Aur har ghar mein sir aap jante honge teen se char kam se kam do to bathroom hoti hote hain sir aapki date mein.
Aur self har jagah lagti hai sir.
To aisa bhi product nahi hai ki koi seasonal product hai aapka to iski demand bhi jyada hai product ki sir. To consumption bhi jyada hi hai sir aur har koi banda che mahine mein saal bhar mein change bhi karwata rehta hai sir self apni.
To agar aapko business acha lena hai to sir aapko byer to consume karni padegi na regular basis ke upar sir aapko.
Hello
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir agar Rajkot ke andar jaise aapne last time bhi mere ko bataya tha ki Patel wale hain, fittings wale hain, CSI wale hain, prime plastic ho gaya, samil enterprises ho gaya. Ye sab same aap hi ke log hain sir aap jaise log hain ye bhi inka business bhi aapke jaisa hi hai bilkul.
To aap ek mauka deke dekho sir theek hai. Kya pata aapke paas acha conversion aa jaye acha business aa jaye achi maturity mil jaye sir aapko. Aap use to karo service ko. Tabhi hum
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough orders.

- Believes orders should come automatically.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of using service.

- Advised to connect with potential buyers.

- Highlighted success of other Rajkot suppliers.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, rajkot suppliers
